titles.title: Immigration Reform Act of 1994

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the expedited deportation of criminal aliens, to expand the health-related causes for which aliens may be excluded, to prohibit certain Federal benefits to aliens who are not lawfully within the United States, and to provide that aliens applying for asylum shall be detained.

bill.summary: 3/16/1994--Introduced. Immigration Reform Act of 1994 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to: (1) provide for expedited deportation and exclusion of convicted aliens; (2) expand the grounds for health-related alien exclusions; (3) prohibit direct Federal financial benefits to unlawful aliens; and (4) provide for detention of aliens applying for asylum.
